content.raw:
Hi Alfredo,

thank you for reaction - I actually used “subt\_seed' as base for our docker

‌

```
FROM osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:subt_solution_latest
```

can you confirm that if I submit the image without our changes it should score 1 point in practice\_tunnel01? If yes, I would try it just to reduce the uncertainty.

Regarding privacy message - thanks, but feel free to paste it even here, as other teams may have the same issue.
